AUBE PROJECTS Area ADX Form 2.55 [Code]-[Location]; [Select]@[Wall Height]CL; [Cornice Type]; [Wall Type (adx)] Walls; [Ceiling Type] Ceiling; [Batt Rating] [Code] if [Wall Height] = 2.4 then result := 'L01' else if [Wall Height] = 2.55 then result := 'L02' else if [Wall Height] = 2.7 then result := 'L03' else if [Wall Height] = 3.0 then result := 'L04' else if [Wall Height] = 3.07 then result := 'L05' else if [Wall Height] = 3.15 then result := 'L06' else if [Wall Height] = 3.3 then result := 'L07' else if [Wall Height] = 3.375 then result := 'L08' else if [Wall Height] = 3.6 then result := 'L09' else if [Wall Height] = 3.9 then result := 'L10' else if [Wall Height] = 4.05 then result := 'L11' else if [Wall Height] = 4.2 then result := 'L12' else if [Wall Height] = 6.0 then result := 'L13' else result := 'error' 1 Living Area
